articles.Title: Live: Greg Inglis to announce NRL retirement
articles.Intro: Greg Inglish has arrived at South Sydney headquarters and will front a media conferce later this morning to announce his retirement from rugby league.

articles.Title: Opal Tower units still closed as work only approved now
articles.Intro: People are still unable to move back into almost half the apartments in Opal Tower more than three months after cracks appeared in the trouble-plagued building and final rectification works have only just been given the green light.

articles.Title: One Nation support has crashed: Newspoll
Two fake cops robbed Sydney currency exchange shop
